DOC.HEADLINE: VOLUNTEERS NEEDED TO PREPARE SOCCER FIELD AT OXNARD COLLEGE
DOC.TEXT: Volunteers are needed Saturday to lay sod for a second soccer field at Oxnard College . The field will be used this summer by international teams training for the World Cup championships , to be held for the first time in the United States.Oxnard College is an official World Cup training site , but because it did not have regulation-size soccer fields , the college has had to build two this month . Volunteers , many of them college staff_members and students , laid sod for the first field March 5 . The volunteers worked so quickly that they spread about 100 # 000 square_feet of sod in less than seven hours , college officials said . The effort will start Saturday at 6:30 a.m. For information , call the college ' s public information office at 986-5809 .
